title: Best of The Program | Guest: Carol Roth | 10/24/22
description:
Glenn reviews the latest craziness from over the weekend: President Biden zoned out during an MSNBC interview, China’s President Xi kicked out a former president, and the U.S. Army’s 101st Airborne division was deployed to Europe for the first time since World War II. Many of the Democrats’ top priorities seem to boil down to one goal: Reduce the population. Why is China buying up gold from the West? Financial expert Carol Roth joins to give her theory.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
